bibl.title: The Sophists and Hellenistic Religion: Prodicus as the Spiritual Father of the Isis Aretalogies.
bibl.note: 1. Prodicus' concept of deification. - 2. Followers of Prodicus. - 3. Prodicus and the so-called Euhemerism of the Isis aretalogies.
